channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Slackbot is an AI agent now
item.description: Salesforce unveils Slackbot, a new AI agent that allows users to complete tasks across multiple enterprise applications from Slack.

item.title: Microsoft Has a Plan to Keep Its Data Centers From Raising Your Electric Bill
item.description: In response to a growing backlash, Microsoft said it would take steps to ensure that data centers don't raise utility bills in surrounding areas and a...

item.title: Urevo SpaceWalk 5L Walking Pad Review: Compact and Affordable
item.description: Urevo’s affordable new walking pad is cheaper than a round-trip ticket to hike in Iceland.

item.title: Atonemo Streamplayer Review: Make Old Speakers New Again
item.description: Can this discrete audio puck really drag any old speakers into the streaming age?

item.title: Reid Hoffman Wants Silicon Valley to ‘Stand Up’ Against the Trump Administration
item.description: The LinkedIn cofounder and frequent Trump target has a simple message for his peers: “Just speak up about the things that you think are true.”

item.title: Superorganism raises $25M to back biodiversity startups
item.description: Superorganism launched in 2023 as what it claims is the first venture capital firm focused on biodiversity, aiming to serve as the conservationist on ...

item.title: Brazil orders Meta to suspend policy banning third-party AI chatbots from WhatsApp
item.description: Brazil's competition watchdog has ordered WhatsApp to put on hold its policy that bars third-party AI companies from using its business API to offer c...

item.title: Deepgram raises $130M at $1.3B valuation and buys a YC AI startup
item.description: Deepgram is raising its Series C round at a $1.3 billion valuation.

item.title: Board Review: Tabletop Video Games With Physical Pieces
item.description: I loved Board’s unique blend of tabletop gaming, but my family gave it mixed reviews.

item.title: Apple launches ‘Creator Studio’ bundle of apps for $12.99 per month
item.description: The bundle includes access to Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, and Pixelmator Pro on Mac and iPad, as well as Motion, Compressor, and MainStage on Mac.
